Students with money can come any time between 7-7:20.

Scholastic accepts cash, credit cards, and tap to pay (Apple pay, Google Pay, etc). Students and parents can also set up an EWallet through our school's book fair website.
  *
 Families can go to the website (https://bookfairs.scholastic.com/bf/coopertownmiddleschool)to contribute to our "Share the Fair" fund, which helps students in need get something from the fair.
